column1: Smoque BBQ////The meat was delicious.  The brisket
column2: the pulled pork and the ribs were all excellent.  The brisket was the best in my opinion.  I also suggest the fries as a side.  They are tasty and they give you a ton.  I do not recommend the beans.  I just didn't like them.  The mac and cheese was good
column3: but it was small.  The cornbread was also good
